import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={loading:false,listNoti:[],countUnreadNoti:null};export var notiSlice=createSlice({name:"noti",initialState:initialState,reducers:{getNoti:function getNoti(state,action){state.loading=true;},getNotiSuccess:function getNotiSuccess(state,action){state.listNoti=action.payload.results;state.countUnreadNoti=action.payload.total_unread;state.loading=false;},getNotiFailed:function getNotiFailed(state){state.loading=false;}}});// actions
export var notiActions=notiSlice.actions;// reducers
var notiReducer=notiSlice.reducer;export default notiReducer;// selectors
export var selectLoading=function selectLoading(state){return state.noti.loading;};export var selectListNoti=function selectListNoti(state){return state.noti.listNoti;};export var selectCountUnreadNoti=function selectCountUnreadNoti(state){return state.noti.countUnreadNoti;};
